Package net.authorize.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicXmlDocument  
    BOMStripperInputStream
    The UnicodeBOMInputStream class wraps any InputStream and detects the presence of any Unicode BOM (Byte Order Mark) at its beginning, as defined by RFC 3629 - UTF-8, a transformation format of ISO 10646
    BOMStripperInputStream.BOM
    Type safe enumeration class that describes the different types of Unicode BOMs.
    Constants  
    DateUtil  
    DeepCopy
    Utility for making deep copies (vs.
    HttpCallTask
    Callable task to make http calls in future
    HttpClient
    Transportation object used to facilitate the communication with the respective gateway.
    HttpUtility
    Helper methods for http calls
    LogHelper  
    Luhn  
    ResponseParser
    Parses a response string from Authorize.net into a Map of values.
    StringUtils  
    XmlTreeUtil  
    XmlUtility
    Helper methods for serializing and de-serializing to XML using JAXB
